document_data.name: Quarter of No Hope
document_data.mainbody: The '''Quarter of No Hope''' was the name given to the slums of the city of [[Ormpe]] in [[Durpar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name="tSS-p62>
document_data.Description: The slums were located outside of Ormpe's stone walls.
document_data.Inhabitants: The majority of the nearly 5,000 inhabitants of the Quarter of No Hope scraped by as grain workers.
